product_overview: Aura Clean is a premium React-based cleaning services platform enabling users to browse services, book appointments through a guided multi-step wizard, manage their bookings on a personalized dashboard, and contact the company easily. Admin users have a dedicated dashboard to manage bookings, contact messages, and update statuses with secure role-based access.
core_goals: Provide a seamless and intuitive user experience for browsing and booking cleaning services
Ensure secure user authentication and personalized user dashboard for booking management
Enable efficient admin management of bookings, contact messages, and service status updates
Ensure data integrity and real-time synchronization with Supabase backend
Deliver responsive and accessible UI/UX with smooth animations and error handling
Implement robust email notifications for booking confirmations, status updates, and contact form interactions
key_features: Home page with hero section, services overview, process steps, testimonials, and trust indicators
Comprehensive services page displaying all cleaning services with filtering and detailed info
Four-step booking wizard including service selection, schedule, customer details, and confirmation with price calculation
Contact page with validated contact form and email notifications
About page detailing company story, mission, values, milestones, and team
User authentication with Supabase Auth including login, logout, and protected routes
User dashboard with booking views, cancellation ability, and status tracking
Admin dashboard featuring booking and contact message management with status updates and statistics
Responsive design with mobile menus and accessibility compliant ARIA attributes
Email integration with Resend for booking and contact communications
user_flow_summary: Public users visit the home page to explore services and learn about the company
Users browse and filter cleaning services on the services page
Authenticated users book cleaning appointments via a four-step wizard: service selection, scheduling, entering details, and confirmation
Users receive email confirmations upon booking and can manage appointments via the dashboard
Users submit inquiries through a validated contact form and receive confirmation emails
Admins log in to the admin dashboard to view and manage bookings, update statuses, and respond to contact messages
validation_criteria: All pages load within 2 seconds with optimized images and caching
Booking price calculation applies correctly based on property size and service base price
Authentication enforces access restrictions to protected routes
Booking flow validates inputs at each step and prevents past-date bookings
Forms perform field validation with error feedback
Email notifications are sent on booking confirmations, cancellations, and contact submissions
Admin updates to booking and message statuses trigger email notifications
Responsive design adapts layouts and navigation for mobile, tablet, and desktop
Accessibility standards WCAG 2.1 AA compliance with keyboard usability and ARIA labels
